name: biantr
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wa(wb(w0, w1), wb(w2, w1)), wb(w0, w2))

stmt.origin: biimparc(wb(w0, w1), wb(w2, w1), wb(w0, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wb(w0, w1), wb(w2, w1)), wb(w0, w2))
-| wi(wb(w2, w1), wb(wb(w0, w2), wb(w0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wb(w0, w1), wb(w2, w1)), wb(w0, w2))
-| wi(wb(w2, w1), wb(wb(w0, w2), wb(w0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wb(w2, w1), wb(wb(w0, w2), wb(w0, w1)))
-| wi(wb(w2, w1), wb(w2, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wb(w0, w1), wb(w2, w1)), wb(w0, w2))
-| wi(wb(w2, w1), wb(w2, w1))
|- wi(wa(wb(w0, w1), wb(w2, w1)), wb(w0, w2))

comment: A transitive law of equivalence. Compare Theorem *4.22 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 117. (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-1993.)
